body:
## What's Changed
* Ceres manifold by @strasdat in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/355
* Add missing header files (ceres manifold). by @versatran01 in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/357
* Sympy module cleanup by @strasdat in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/356
* Sim3 constr add, missing SOPHUS_FUNC tags by @strasdat in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/369
* Dx_exp_x_times_point_at_0 by @strasdat in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/371
* Look for Ceres 2.1.0 by @MartinEekGerhardsen in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/360
* fmt-v9 compatibility by @DmitriyKorchemkin in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/376
* Bug fix:- missing SOPHUS_FUNC in QuaternionProduct, so3.hpp by @rohanchabra in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/423
* docs: fix versioning scheme 22.10 -> 1.22.4 by @strasdat in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/466
* Fix various typos by @pmoulon in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/475
* Fix disable failing mac ci by @strasdat in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/525
* Sophus python binding by @chpeng-fb in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/522
* Update CMakeLists.txt by @cedricpradalier in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/528
* Reduce Eigen/Dense to Eigen/Core in sophus/rotation_matrix.hpp by @fwcore in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/532
* Make SO3<Scalar>::cast<Scalar>() a noop by @Dvad in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/526
* Fix SO2 when using ceres jet by @Dvad in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/524
* Make all `setRotationMatrix()` takes constant reference by @AAArthurLiu in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/521
* Update test_common.cpp: use integer constant for knot index by @cedricpradalier in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/529
* maintenance update by @strasdat in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/538
* smaller docs and CI tweaks by @strasdat in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/539
* docs: vcpkg build instructions by @strasdat in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/543
* Fix missing dependencies on ci by @strasdat in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/544
* compiler toolchain tweaks by @strasdat in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/545
* a number of lint/docs/tool tweaks by @strasdat in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/546

## New Contributors
* @MartinEekGerhardsen made their first contribution in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/360
* @rohanchabra made their first contribution in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/423
* @pmoulon made their first contribution in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/475
* @chpeng-fb made their first contribution in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/522
* @cedricpradalier made their first contribution in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/528
* @fwcore made their first contribution in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/532
* @Dvad made their first contribution in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/526
* @AAArthurLiu made their first contribution in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/521

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/compare/1.22.4...1.24.6

name: 1.24.6-rc1
body:
## What's Changed
* Bug fix:- missing SOPHUS_FUNC in QuaternionProduct, so3.hpp by @rohanchabra in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/423
* docs: fix versioning scheme 22.10 -> 1.22.4 by @strasdat in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/466
* Fix various typos by @pmoulon in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/475
* Fix disable failing mac ci by @strasdat in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/525
* Sophus python binding by @chpeng-fb in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/522
* Update CMakeLists.txt by @cedricpradalier in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/528
* Reduce Eigen/Dense to Eigen/Core in sophus/rotation_matrix.hpp by @fwcore in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/532
* Make SO3<Scalar>::cast<Scalar>() a noop by @Dvad in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/526
* Fix SO2 when using ceres jet by @Dvad in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/524
* Make all `setRotationMatrix()` takes constant reference by @AAArthurLiu in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/521
* Update test_common.cpp: use integer constant for knot index by @cedricpradalier in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/529
* maintenance update by @strasdat in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/538
* smaller docs and CI tweaks by @strasdat in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/539
* docs: vcpkg build instructions by @strasdat in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/543
* Fix missing dependencies on ci by @strasdat in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/544
* compiler toolchain tweaks by @strasdat in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/545

## New Contributors
* @rohanchabra made their first contribution in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/423
* @pmoulon made their first contribution in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/475
* @chpeng-fb made their first contribution in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/522

* @fwcore made their first contribution in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/532
* @Dvad made their first contribution in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/526
* @AAArthurLiu made their first contribution in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/521

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/compare/1.22.10...1.24.6-rc1

* Ceres manifold by @strasdat in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/355

* Sympy module cleanup by @strasdat in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/356
* Sim3 constr add, missing SOPHUS_FUNC tags by @strasdat in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/369
* Dx_exp_x_times_point_at_0 by @strasdat in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/371
* Look for Ceres 2.1.0 by @MartinEekGerhardsen in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/360
* fmt-v9 compatibility by @DmitriyKorchemkin in https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/pull/376
